website_summaries.verdict: The perfect stocking stuffer for young explorers. Kids who enjoy bird watching and discovering nature will love that they are powerful enough to see details from a distance.
pros: Rubber coating protects them against drops and bumps
Comes with accessories including a carrying bag and wrist strap, and backed by a 2-year warranty
cons: Can take a little time and effort to focus
Some may have flaws, but the warranty provides peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: Blue Cabi kids binoculars
customer_reviews.text: What I liked most was the quality of the material to hold onto. No slipping, easy to adjust the eye piece, the view is good and clear. My grandson was looking out into the ocean and could see another ship in the distance, he was thrilled. Then took them on a land excursion and was just as thrilled looking down into the grass at some insects! For the money it is a great buy, even his dad was impressed... oh, and it came with a neck strap, very helpful too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: vroke into pieces when they were dropped
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 2 grandsons. After about 4 weeks, one dropped and they broke into pieces. The eye part just snapped apart. I did not contact the company as I should have. Just came across the zip loc with 3 pieces as I was house cleaning. Now I read on line that there is actually a design flaw. I am disappointed- thought it was a quality product and would be fun when the family went camping.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and durable binoc’s
customer_reviews.text: i was skeptical about the size when I ordered these. When they arrived I was relieved to discover that not only do they fit my 2 and 4 year olds faces, they are very powerful, clear and made of a material that is durable for falls. They come with a protective bag, a lanyard for wearing and a material for cleaning the glass area’s. These are worth every penny! I’d certainly buy them again if ever needed. They are more than we’d hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: T&GHall

customer_reviews.title: These are great little binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are great little binoculars, with an emphasis on little. I took them out of the box (which has a picture of a little kid on it), and put them in my 11-year-old son's stocking. He loved them and thinks they're great, but might not have been as excited if he had seen the box. He didn't, and thinks they are small for easier carrying on adventures. Which is true. But they are quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality kids binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, but didn't use them, as I sent them 1,000 miles away to two boys as gifts. They seemed to be very good quality, however, and well-packaged. The kids will have fun with them, I'm sure, and I don't think you can go wrong purchasing this item for a child. The value seems just right, too!
customer_reviews.author: Theodora

customer_reviews.title: & 7) love it! Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Works well and my boys (ages 1, 3, 5, & 7) love it! Easy to adjust, didn't break when it's been dropped, and is comfortable in the hands. The only thing I'd change is to make the clasp on the band better so it doesn't come undone so easily. I just ended up tying it in a knot, then clasping it and there haven't been any more problems.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are perfect for kids! They are easy to use and the quality is good. The binocularts arrived on time, in good condiotion, for a reasonable price. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought these binoculars for our 7-year-old grandson. When he opened the package, he was surprised and delighted. After figuring out which end to look through, he really liked them. They appear rugged and fit well into his hands.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: really nice binocs. The pupillary distance is great for kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three for my small grandsons. I opened one, really nice binocs. The pupillary distance is great for kids (not adults!) and the optics are good. Really solid and good quality. Order arrived in good shape and on time. I Highly recommend for the little folks in your life. They come with a nice little case, and the lanyards are separate, so they can be put aside for safety
customer_reviews.author: R Bill

customer_reviews.title: he told me he loved the binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cute little binoculars as a birthday present for my 5 year old grandson. As soon as I gave it to him, he attached the enclosed strap to the binoculars and wore it around his neck and went to the backyard looking for birds. When he came back to the house, he told me he loved the binoculars. I like the binoculars too, because it is well made and fits perfectly in the little hands. The lenses are very sharp also. Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chu

customer_reviews.title: Kid Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Received these binoculars well-packaged and item was as stated. These will be a great little gift for my granddaughter; safe, lightweight,comes with instructions and little carrying case. Very fast, efficient shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Energizer

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids loved these binoculars
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved these binoculars! They are just the right size for little hands!! My 5 and 8 year olds are having a great time with them!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P

customer_reviews.title: her favorite color. these are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Item as a Christmas present for my grand-daughter. She is 3, almost 4 She has been wanting a pair, but I could not find any small enough that was blue, her favorite color. these are perfect.. They are the right color , right size and right price. I know she will be very happy to open her box on Christmas day and find these,
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Cost no more than some of the other kid binoculars but more powerful!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my 3 year old neighbor for Christmas. Once he was shown how they work he used them all day. He even took them to church and used them when they had to sit in the back of the building. He's only had them for a day so I can't comment on the durability or if he'll continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fite

customer_reviews.title: Great for children who love animals
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 9 yo nephew. He loves animals so will be used for land as well as air! The only thing that might be hard for him is focusing them in as it has the turn knob. Color is great, size fits his hand, is very manageble and the focus is very clear. Price is good. He was very excited.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Nice binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I did a quick look over before giving as a gift. Nice set of binoculars, clear optics and smooth adjustment. I would have loved them as a kid.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 3yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3yr old. He loves them! Excited to take him to the zoo with these.. soon I hope. Love the color, feel, you can focus them.. they’re just as good as regular adult binoculars. They’re the perfect size for his little face. Even my 8&9 year old boys love them. Best gift!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for 4-year old nephew. He loves it and uses it for everything. Good quality and is an actual working set.

customer_reviews.title: excellent magnification
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 6 year old nephew. He had previously used a pair that were better suited for someone a little younger. This pair is the right mix of great magnifications, smaller/more like real binoculars but with the rubber coating that will keep them safe when the 6 year inevitably drops them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good optics for price
customer_reviews.text: These have been some great little binoculars. My three children share them and they have been very durable. These binos also have good optics for the price. Since these are so portable, I find my self using them more than my expensive ones!
customer_reviews.author: Hlh

customer_reviews.title: Great Binoculars for kids or adults!
customer_reviews.text: These are very simple to use. My boys love them and carry them wherever they go, and they are only four and six.

They are heavy and durable....do not seem like they will break easily and he LOVES them! We are all very pleased with them! I would recommend them over any cheaper ones and for a child, they are a really good fit!
customer_reviews.author: S Hughes

customer_reviews.title: but they both love them! Shipping was fast and product price was ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair for my grandsons for their camp (ages 2 and 4). The 2 year old obviously hasn't got the knack of how to completely use them, but they both love them! Shipping was fast and product price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Frary

customer_reviews.title: The case and the attractive coloring were a nice bonus. I ordered a little late
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my six-year-old granddaughter's birthday, which was a few days ago, so I cannot make a real judgment about durability. The magnification is about right for a youngster; anything greater than 6X would prevent her locating her objects. The case and the attractive coloring were a nice bonus. I ordered a little late, still got it in time for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs for my grand daughters who were going on a camping trip.....ages 5 and 2....they were a big hit. Hopefully they will have them for sometime to come
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and value for the money. The only drawback is the neck strap, which requires tying some sort of knots to attach to the eyelets on the binoculars. The neck strap also has a snap-together link in the middle which could just as easily snap apart and result in the binoculars dropping to the ground. I put the neck strap in the trash, which it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these binoculars for Easter basket gifts for my grandsons ages 3,4 &5. I did, however, get a pair out and test them - I was shocked at how good they are - just like miniature adult ones. I am soooooo excited to give them to my boys...only a couple of weeks to go!! Thank you.

product_meta.title: BlueCabi Shock Proof 8x21 Kids Binoculars - High Resolution Real Optics Childrens Compact Binocular Set - Great for Science, Bird Watching, Outdoor Play, Travel, and Gifts for Boys & Girls
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY - BlueCabi 8 x 21 Durable Binoculars Has a Rubber Coating that Absorbs Shock and can Withstand Drops and Falls on Floors, Convenient Carrying Case, Clean Cloth, and Long Neck Strap Included.
BEST MAGNIFICATION - This Compact Children Binoculars Has a 8x Magnification with Objective Lens Diameter 21mm with an Amazing View, The Kids Lenses & Prisms are from Optical Glass.

IMPROVED SAFETY - This Superior Safety Binoculars for Kids has Rubber Surrounded Eyepieces included for Eye Protection so Children dont get Hurt, and can be Folded to Match Eye to Eye Distance of Child.

EASY TO FOCUS - Designed for Children to use Easily, Great for Bird Watching, Learning, Star Gazing, Hunting, Sports Games, Theatres, Boat Rides, Hiking, Travel, Summer Fun and Enjoying the Wilderness!
BUY WITH CONFINDENCE - This Amazing Binoculars is Small and Lightweight Designed, Manufactured Under Strict Quality Control, and is Specially Sturdy Designed to Last for Many Years!
